title.en: A Story About Being Attacked by an Armed JK (Reboot)

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre ser atacado por uma colegial armada (Reboot)

description.en:
What would you do if an armed high school girl pulled a gun on you and demanded a sexathon every night? Don't lie, you know you would.

A reboot of [A Story About Being Attacked by an Armed JK](https://mangadex.org/title/381f1c5e-d1b2-421d-9358-840187c7d99a/a-story-about-being-attacked-by-an-armed-jk).
description.pt-br: O que você faria se uma garota do ensino médio puxasse uma arma e exigisse longas sessões de sexo todas as noites? Não minta, nós sabemos o que você faria.

biography.en:
Web comic artist. Not to be confused with the non-fiction author of the same name [Kazuki (kazuki5)](https://mangadex.org/author/fed01cb9-9038-4b4e-a26e-0748f69146ab), the mangaka [Kazuki (カズキ)](https://mangadex.org/author/7741cf13-7946-42b8-8d0f-84a4d63ff481), the het H-manga artist [Kazuki (かづき)](https://mangadex.org/author/867695db-f1ba-40a2-9743-3b8de2820fac), or the BL doujin artist [Kazuki (架月)](https://mangadex.org/author/848d178b-4d69-4cf2-adc7-e37d67f3e6e7).

**Native name**: かずき

**Alt. names**:
ka3uki
